text: What's up outliers quick video outlining the week ahead what we have coming down the pike and this past week was a general massive rally across all the indices we saw in spy cues I WM. So, fall got pretty meaningfully suppressed by that. So, when I look at the week ahead

This is just another weekly expiration cycle is all the way up at 95. That's also very interesting to me. There's part of me that thinks maybe they think that the earnings release might shift out. Again, that is pure tinfoil because I have no idea why that would happen other than the fact that I just see a lot of volatility in another weekly expiration without something I can I positively identify why it would be the case. Typically, if I was looking at an options chain and I see this kind of vol here, my assumption is actually that earnings would be here, not here. So I have to see where we go from there.
